text: Balia balitsanga riba (obukhala bulakwanile) shibasinjila halali shinga asinjilanga utililwe nende imisebe. Ako nilwokhuba mbu baboola mbu; “ iganga ili shinga Riba’ Halali Nyasaye achamila inganga ne akaana riba. Kho ulia ulilwe nende amachelo okhurula khu Nyasaye wuwe omulesi, mana niyeyikalila, oyo akeke kali mukabura, ne amakhuwa kaye kali khu- Nyasaye. Ne balia bachamanga riba abo nibo Abandu bomulilo, balimenyamo tsinyanga tsiosi
